definition: to send/to devote/to deliver/to cause/to convey
to rise from poverty and become prosperous (idiom)/poverty alleviation
to become rich by one's own efforts/self-made

sentences.english: The merchants realized that it was important to expand the clan influence if they wanted to get wealthy.
sentences.chinese: 商人认识到扩大宗族势力与自身致富有直接的关系。

sentences.english: "I first became rich selling homing pigeons, " he explained.
sentences.chinese: “我开始是靠卖家鸽致富的”，他解释道。

sentences.english: The Wealth Creation Series is a series of 8 one-minute episodes.
sentences.chinese: 致富系列是一套八集，每集一分钟的电视特辑。

sentences.english: The effort to privatize state-owned enterprises turned into an enrichment scheme for cronies of the regime.
sentences.chinese: 而国企私有化则成了政权姻亲的致富模式。

sentences.english: How, then, in this environment, should one grow wealthy?
sentences.chinese: 那么，在这样的环境中，您应该如何致富呢？

sentences.english: You don’t have to give up anything to become wealthy.
sentences.chinese: 你不需要为发家致富放弃什么。

sentences.english: Therefore, to improve the allocation of resources is the fundamental approach to social wealth.
sentences.chinese: 所以改善资源配置是一个社会致富的根本之道。

sentences.english: Farmers in this region quickly got rid of poverty and became better off after the establishment of the agricultural economic system.
sentences.chinese: 大农业体系的建立，使这个地区的农民很快脱贫致富。

sentences.english: In the local "mountain to get rich, multi-star anise , cinnamon tree, " the concept of people.
sentences.chinese: 在当地的“山区致富，多八角，肉桂树，”人的概念。

sentences.english: Alcoholics and drug  addicts who are not yet rich are unlikely  candidates for becoming so.
sentences.chinese: 还未致富的嗜酒者和吸毒者不太可能变为富有。

sentences.english: This is another very difficult route to wealth.
sentences.chinese: 这是另一个非常艰难的致富道路。

sentences.english: Capitalists use laborers' surplus value to make a fortune.
sentences.chinese: 资本家利用劳工的剩余价值发家致富。

sentences.english: Trade liberalization was put forward as a sure route to prosperity for developing countries.
sentences.chinese: 贸易自由化被视为发展中国家致富的必由之路。

sentences.english: The bankers inthe north grew rich on the work of the slaves.
sentences.chinese: 北方的银行家们是靠奴隶们的劳动而致富的。

sentences.english: As news of Marco's riches got about, many Venetians started for China.
sentences.chinese: 当马可致富的消息传开，许多威尼斯人开始出发中国。

sentences.english: Today, the most rich road to riches are among our most popular thing.
sentences.chinese: 今天，最发财致富之道都在我们最常用的东西之中。

definition: to rise from poverty and become prosperous (idiom)/poverty alleviation
to become rich by one's own efforts/self-made
to lift oneself out of poverty
to lay down a family fortune/to get rich/to become prosperous
the first pot of gold/the initial profits from an economic endeavour
to begin an undertaking/to start a major task/to initiate/to venture/venture/entrepreneurship
